ISSUE.TITLE: [CI] FullClusterRestartIT testWatcherWithApiKey {cluster=UPGRADED} failing

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Removing the type from the destination index when using CreateIndexFromSourceAction (#121982) It is possible to create an index in 7.x with a single type. This fixes the CreateIndexFromSourceAction to not copy that type over when creating a destination index from a source index with a type.
